longBusinessSummary: Bank of Labor Bancshares, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for Bank of Labor that provides various banking products and services in Kansas. The company accepts checking, money market, savings, zero balance accounts, and insured cash sweep accounts. Its loan products include equipment loans, commercial real estate loans, commercial line of credit, emergency loan programs, and paycheck-protection program loans. The company also offers credit and debit cards; investment solutions comprising national certificate of deposits, investment management, and custodial accounts; and ACH, lock box, merchant, payroll, and online and mobile banking services. The company was formerly known as Brotherhood Bancshares, Inc. Bank of Labor Bancshares, Inc. was founded in 1924 and is based in Kansas City, Kansas.
